'''Eric Roger Patrick Miller''' <ref name="indigo.ie">[http://indigo.ie/~kands/kands/html/miller.html Tom Keogh [[Sunday World]]]</ref> (born September 23, 1975, [[Dublin]], [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]]) is a former Irish [[rugby union]] and [[Gaelic football]] player. As a rugby player Miller played for, among others [[Old Wesley]], [[Leicester Tigers]], [[Leinster Rugby|Leinster]], the [[Barbarian F.C.|Barbarians]], [[Ireland national rugby union team|Ireland]], [[The World]] and the [[British and Irish Lions]]. After retiring as a rugby player, Miller switched football codes and went onto play gaelic football for [[Dublin GAA|Dublin]].
+
'''Eric Roger Patrick Miller''' <ref name="indigo.ie">[http://indigo.ie/~kands/kands/html/miller.html Tom Keogh [[Sunday World]]]</ref> (born September 23, 1975, [[Dublin]], [[Republic of Ireland|Ireland]]) is a former Irish [[rugby union]] and [[Gaelic football]] player. As a rugby player Miller played for, among others [[Old Wesley]], [[Leicester Tigers]], [[Leinster Rugby|Leinster]], the [[Barbarian F.C.|Barbarians]], [[Ireland national rugby union team|Ireland]] and the [[British and Irish Lions]]. After retiring as a rugby player, Miller switched football codes and went onto play gaelic football for [[Dublin GAA|Dublin]].

==Early years==

==Retirement==
==Retirement==
â
Since finishing with Gaelic Football, Miller set up his own personal training company called the real golf solution.<ref>[http://www.ericmillergolfsolution.com/theteam.html]</ref> He has also had a rather successful coaching career. In September 2006 he undertook a coaching position in [[Wesley College, Dublin]] until 2009. He is also currently coaching for [[Old Wesley]] as well as Saint Gerard's School for the blind
+
Since finishing with Gaelic Football, Miller set up his own personal training company called the real golf solution.<ref>[http://www.ericmillergolfsolution.com/theteam.html]</ref> He has also had a rather successful coaching career. In September 2006 he undertook a coaching position in [[Wesley College, Dublin]] until 2009. He is also currently coaching for [[Old Wesley]] as well as Saint Gerard's School
